name: Wenzhen Yuan 0001
content: Wenzhen Yuan | Siebel School of Computing and Data Science | Illinois Wenzhen Yuan Wenzhen Yuan Assistant Professor yuanwz@illinois.edu 3340 Siebel Center for Comp Sci For More Information RoboTouch Lab's webpage Education Doctorate of Philosophy, Mechanical Engineering, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), 2018 Master of Science, Mechanical Engineering, Massachusetts Institute of Technology ( MIT), 2014 Bachelor of Engineer, Mechanical Engineering, Tsinghua University, 2012 Research Interests Tactile sensing, and its application in robot perception and manipulation; Soft robotics; Haptics Research Areas Artificial Intelligence Recent Courses TaughtCS 498 GS3 (CS 498 GSG, CS 498 GSU) - Designing Op-based Sensors CS 498 RM3 (CS 498 RMG, CS 498 RMU) - Robot Manipulation CS 598 TH1 - Tactile Sensing and Haptics ECE 470 (AE 482, ME 445) - Introduction to Robotics Related News Doorbot debuts at ICRA CS professor Wenzhen Yuan named IEEE RAS Early Academic Career Award winner CS STARS program broadens engagement for undergraduate women News Notes
